title: Sheriff: Self-inflicted fatal gunshot was accidental
content:
CHETEK, Wis. (AP) -- Investigators say a fatal shooting in Barron County is apparently an accident.
Sheriff's deputies and police were called to a residence in Chetek Tuesday night on a report of a shooting. Twenty-five-year-old Paul Rederer was found dead of a gunshot wound.
Authorities say it appears it was an accidental self-inflicted gunshot and that alcohol and drug use were contributing factors.
The Barron County Medical Examiner's Office is investigating.
Copyright 2016: Associated Press
